UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user profile within the POTS Tracker app.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user profile.

dateJoined.description: Date and time when the user joined the app.

SymptomLog.title: SymptomLog
SymptomLog.description: Represents a single symptom log entry.

ActivityLog.title: ActivityLog
ActivityLog.description: Represents a single entry in the user's activity feed.

ExerciseLog.title: ExerciseLog
ExerciseLog.description: Represents a log entry for an exercise session.

id.description: Unique identifier for the exercise log entry.

exerciseType.description: Type of exercise performed (horizontal/upright, endurance, resistance).

duration.description: Duration of the exercise session in minutes.

rpe.description: Rate of Perceived Exertion (RPE) level during the exercise.

date.description: Date and time when the exercise was performed.

VolumeExpansionLog.title: VolumeExpansionLog
VolumeExpansionLog.description: Represents a log entry for daily salt and fluid intake.

id.description: Unique identifier for the volume expansion log entry.

saltIntake.description: Daily salt intake in grams of sodium (up to 10g).

fluidIntake.description: Daily fluid intake in liters (up to 3L).

SleepPositionLog.title: SleepPositionLog
SleepPositionLog.description: Represents a log entry for sleep position, tracking head elevation.

id.description: Unique identifier for the sleep position log entry.

headElevated.description: Indicates whether the head was elevated 4-6 inches during sleep.

date.description: Date and time of the sleep recording.

CompressionGarmentLog.title: CompressionGarmentLog
CompressionGarmentLog.description: Represents a log entry for compression garment use.

id.description: Unique identifier for the compression garment log entry.

garmentType.description: Type of compression garment used (abdomen-high or full-lower-body).

duration.description: Duration of compression garment use in hours.

date.description: Date and time of garment use.

PhysicalCountermeasureLog.title: PhysicalCountermeasureLog
PhysicalCountermeasureLog.description: Represents a log entry for physical countermeasures used.

id.description: Unique identifier for the physical countermeasure log entry.

countermeasureType.description: Type of physical countermeasure used (e.g., squeezing a rubber ball, leg crossing).

duration.description: Duration of the countermeasure in minutes.

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the countermeasure was used.

SkinSurfaceCoolingLog.title: SkinSurfaceCoolingLog
SkinSurfaceCoolingLog.description: Represents a log entry for skin surface cooling usage.

id.description: Unique identifier for the skin surface cooling log entry.

usageConditions.description: Conditions under which skin cooling was used.

date.description: Date and time of cooling usage.
